entry.p: Component R/C vs. channel length trade-off table
On-state resistance and capacitance of 6 Ohm and 6 pF.
Insertion loss >= -0.6 dB; Return loss <= -13 dB.
Refer to Electromagnetic Compatibility chapter (Common Mode Choke Selection) for more details.
Refer to Electromagnetic Compatibility chapter (ESD Diode Selection) for more details.
